name: Login/Logout
description:
It is necessary to login to the portal to complete any further tasks
Attempting to login with an invalid or blank username and/or password gives an error message

steps.name: I am on the login screen
I login as "pkadmin" with password "123"
the portal should load

I am on the "Patient List" tab

"Molly Darr" is on the patient list

I select "All" from the "Order Type" menu
I click the "Enter Orders" button
I enter "tylenol" in the "Add Order" field in the "Enter Orders" pane
I select "Tylenol Chew (acetaminophen)  80MG Oral" from the "Formulary Med Orders" list in the search results
I select "Today" from the "When" multiselect in the "Edit Order" pane
I select "Special Inst" from the "Dose" multiselect in the "Edit Order" pane

I select "Daily" from the "Frequency" multiselect in the "Edit Order" pane
I enter "5" in the "Number of Doses" field in the "Edit Order" pane
I click the "OK" button in the "Edit Order" pane
I click the "Sign/Submit" button in the "Order Submission" pane
I refresh the clinical display
